dstm2.factory

Class BaseFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dstm2.factory.BaseFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Factory<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomicFactory, CopyableFactory, RecoverableFactory, SequentialFactory

    public abstract class BaseFactory<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Factory<T>
    Provides utility methods for factories.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseFactory

        public BaseFactory(java.lang.Class<T> _class)
        This constructor separates methods into properties and miscellaneous methods. For properties, it deduces type and name of properties, and stores them in the properties set. Other methods go into the methods field.
        Parameters:
        interfaces - additional interfaces satisfied by this class and understood by this factory.
        _class - interface class

    • Method Detail

      • seal

        protected void seal()
        Once methods and fields have been defined, this method turns the byte code into a Java class.

               java.lang.String name)
        Create a new field.
        Parameters:
        type - BCEL type of field.
        name - field name

      • releaseDefined

        protected boolean releaseDefined()
        Did caller declare a void release() method?
        Returns:
        whether to provide a release() implementation.

      • isAtomicOrScalar

        public boolean isAtomicOrScalar(java.lang.Class _class)
        Checks whether a field type is scalar or declared atomic.
        Parameters:
        _class - class to check
        Returns:
        whether field is legit type for an atomic object
